channel.title: [Delta]How do i change the experience you get per monster on slayer[Delta]
channel.description: Well yeah the Title of the topic says it all. I'm trying to make the exp when you kill monsters for slayer a little bit faster. Please help? and thank you.

item.title: [Delta]How do i change the experience you get per monster on slayer[Delta]
item.dc:creator: @_Jayden1 `Jayden.
item.description:
@_Jayden1 wrote:

Very easy to do.

Open up NPCHandler.java

Next

Search for;

temp.addSkillXP

You should see something like this;

if (npcs[i].npcType == 1153 && temp.taskID == 1153) {
temp.addSkillXP(150, 18);
temp.taskAmount -= 1;
if (temp.taskAmount == 0 || temp.taskAmount == 1) {
temp.taskID = -1;
temp.taskAmount = -1;
temp.sM("You have completed your task. Talk to Vannaka to get a new one.");
}
}

Just change the (150, 180); to what ever, Repeat this process for all the slayer monsters.

Read full topic
item.source: [Delta]How do i change the experience you get per monster on slayer[Delta]
